website_summaries.verdict: Despite some quirks, it's a powerful steam producer that gets hot straightaway.
pros: Prevents limescale buildup thanks to the patented scale collector
Heats quickly and produces a lot of steam
cons: Some users gripe that it stains fabrics

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: The iron is good. It is very smooth after ironing. When not in use, you can stand upright so that your clothes will not be damaged. You can iron 3-4 pieces of clothes at a time when you fill up with water. The heating speed is also very fast. It heats up quickly in a few seconds. Use it right away. easy to use. Just add water and plug in. Can easily meet my requirements. The temperature adjustment design is reasonable and you can choose the size of the water vapor by yourself. Affordable. Very good iron.
customer_reviews.author: Xj666

customer_reviews.title: I bought a great iron.
customer_reviews.text: I selected this iron after searching some irons at amazon.com. It's a good iron absolutely does what it says. It's very light to handle and the heating up is very quickly. It has 3 speed steam modes and 5 temprature adjustments, so I can easy get wrinkles out with or without the steam feature for different clothes. One more thing, its auto clean feature could flushes out mineral deposits and keep it at peak performance.

customer_reviews.title: This is a good iron for clothes.
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy to buy this iron for clothes. It is easy to be a warm-up, easy to switch from 3 speeds steam and 5 different temperatures, and it has lots of functions. The most I like is the automatic shut-off system. When I put the clothes iron on the side after a few minutes, It will power off itself. That is good for people like me always forgot to turn off the clothes iron, it really makes me feel safer.
customer_reviews.author: christine ho

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I have used several expensive brands but when my husband bought this for me, I was amazed by the quality of this iron. I like it’s light weight and easy to use. The steam came out fast and evenly. I have tried on cotton and silk fabrics. They worked perfectly. I recommend this iron if you are looking for an affordable iron.
customer_reviews.author: wq

customer_reviews.title: Light, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This Steam Iron is my second one, it is much lighter than my last one and very easy to use. I have a lot dress shirts now looks much better after I got this Iron, as a businessman, I will be more confident when face customer.
customer_reviews.author: bondhong

customer_reviews.title: you deserve to have
customer_reviews.text: Product is very good The quality is also great It makes every one of my shirts look like new I really like it so much you deserve to have Good choice
customer_reviews.author: AliA

customer_reviews.title: Nice and durable
customer_reviews.text: I think I went through 100 reviews for irons before deciding on this one. It’s a great buy so far. Heats up fast and irons smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: Latoya Telea

customer_reviews.title: Bad iron
customer_reviews.text: Worked very well the first time. By the second time, it kept spitting white power while using the steam function black marks on my clothes. I cleaned it, gave it a rest, and decided to use it a third time. The issues got even worse and, it ruined my work clothes. I would have returned it but I threw the box away. It might have gotten the most defective one because it got good reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Francoise

customer_reviews.title: A steam iron I am looking for
customer_reviews.text: This is a well-built steam iron. Easy to use and operate and really nice for the wool sweater. Water is easy to fill and the price is reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Tian Lu

customer_reviews.title: Light
customer_reviews.text: It is not much heavy and smooth to use but gives good crease on the clothes. Ok for day to day use.
customer_reviews.author: Nirmal

customer_reviews.title: steam hot and quickly
customer_reviews.text: Overall pretty good product. Steam is very hot, but doesn't give a strong blast. Very easy to use, heats up quickly, and is lightweight. Steaming the can make your clothes last much longer! The price is reasonable and worth the money. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: This is a very nice, very big iron.
customer_reviews.text: It was too large and heavy for me to handle.
customer_reviews.author: LOUISE C.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: What a good product! This is my first steam iron, and overall I’m satisfied with it. It is light weight and very easy to use. I used it to smooth my T-shirt, it heated up quickly and did work well. It’s a worthy buy so far.
customer_reviews.author: mao guo peng

customer_reviews.title: Great Iron:)
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for very good iron for so long and finally I found one. I love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is good
customer_reviews.text: It is too small and it it is easy to iron.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: AUTO SHUT OFF did/does not work!
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered 2 of these irons. The 2nd was to replace the 1st because the auto-off feature did not work on the 1st one. Received the 2nd iron today and the auto-off feature doesn't work on this one either.
customer_reviews.author: J&K

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I ordered for my mom to use, It is easy to use, It heats up pretty quick. The instruction is easy to read and it is pretty self explanatory. I taught her how to use and she iron few wrinkle shirts and she likes it. It got the function to iron horizontally and vertically, which it is great. Also it can be dry or wet. Pretty simple good one that can be daily used. Also it is light weight. Overall she is happy about it.
customer_reviews.author: sunnyjake trading inc

customer_reviews.title: Review with Pros & Cons
customer_reviews.text: Here are the pros & cons of this iron as I see it, I hope this help you. Pros: 1. Overall works better than any iron I have ever used 2. Very light weight and comfortable to use 3. Faster then any iron I have ever used 4. Can use tab water instead of buying distilled water with this iron Cons: 1. The instructions warn that the iron will make odors the first use and its does. I highly recommend using this iron outside or on a porch the first 2-3 times you use it. After that the odor goes away and the iron continues to work excellently
customer_reviews.author: The Tally Ho

customer_reviews.title: Nice iron with good price
customer_reviews.text: Not too heavy, excellent steam/spritz features, gets hot enough for linen. A bit larger than our previous irons but that isn't a problem. Retractable cord is great for keeping the cord out of the way of busy pets. Careful while retracting as the plug can get wild as it winds up. Price was ideal and further discounted with an Amazon warehouse deal.
customer_reviews.author: Linda zhang

customer_reviews.title: a great replacement for my old iron
customer_reviews.text: i broke my old iron when i accidently dropped on the floor . i came across for this one and i purcahsed since i like the looks of it this one this one get steam out very quick , is much lighter then my old school one. and it works as it should.
customer_reviews.author: joei huang

customer_reviews.title: Heat up quick
customer_reviews.text: This iron has a really nice sky blue outlook, heat up in just seconds. Gives clothes a very neat and clean look. Super easy to use, definitely recommend this than the handheld one!!
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: very good
customer_reviews.text: I like this iron very much. It's very light. Ironing is very convenient. It does not require much force, and it is small. It looks cute and beautiful. It is very convenient to use. easy and convenient. It's easy to iron out the folds, it looks good, I like it very much.
customer_reviews.author: Xianglan Jin

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: It’s very convenient to use. You don’t need to worry about clothes broken when you were Ironing. Easy to clean and safe time.
customer_reviews.author: hui zhang

customer_reviews.title: Best iron for steam
customer_reviews.text: I am very particular about my iron and I bought this because I love irons with a lot of steam, I have to say it’s the best iron I have ever had. Irons out wrinkles on all types of materials in no time at all and you can add a lot of water at once so less fill ups.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Love my new Iron
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing iron. I love it. The wrinkle free and steam feature work wonderfully. I truly recommend it and I don’t do that often.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use with the quick warm up
customer_reviews.text: High quality steam iron! I couldn’t find my used one at home, and found this one online. I have to say this steam iron works very well for the shirts and the pants. The function is clear and easy to choose, and the steam iron warms up very quickly!
customer_reviews.author: Jarlin J
